mapper.sql: id, hostid, user, version, version_info, uptime, cpu, memory, disk, netcard, oip, isp, lon, lat, down, up, createTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from machine
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into machine (hostid, user, version, version_info, uptime, cpu, memory, disk, netcard, oip, isp, lon, lat, down, up, createTime ) values (#{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{down,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{up,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into machine
hostid,
user,
version,
version_info,
uptime,
cpu,
memory,
disk,
netcard,
oip,
isp,
lon,
lat,
down,
up,
createTime,
#{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uptime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cpu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{disk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{down,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update machine
user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version_info = #{version_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uptime = #{uptime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cpu = #{cpu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memory = #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disk = #{disk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netcard = #{netcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oip = #{oip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isp = #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
down = #{down,jdbcType=INTEGER},
up = #{up,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hostid = #{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update machine set user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_info = #{version_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uptime = #{uptime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpu = #{cpu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memory = #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disk = #{disk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netcard = #{netcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oip = #{oip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isp = #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, down = #{down,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up = #{up,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hostid = #{hostid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
